Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils.networking

Class Connection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.LambdaObservable<Transmittable>
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.networking.Connection
public class Connection
extends LambdaObservable<Transmittable>
A bidirectional connection to a remote host.

      Instantiates a new Connection from a given Socket.
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if it is not possible to get the input or output stream for the socket

      port - the port
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if it is not possible to setup the socket

    • send

      public void send​(Transmittable message)
      Sends a message to the remote host. The message is sent asynchronously (i.e., it is added to a FIFO sending queue and delivered best-effort by another thread).
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be sent

    • startSocketReceiveThread

      private java.lang.Thread startSocketReceiveThread()
      Starts the thread that handles the messages incoming from the remote host.
      Returns:

      private java.lang.Thread startSocketSendThread()
      Starts the thread that handles the messages to be sent to the remote host.
      Returns:
      the thread that handles the messages to be sent to the remote host
